text:
Judith Hoag (born June 29, 1968) is an American television series and movie actress. She is best known for playing April O'Neill in the 1990 movie "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles". She also played Cindy Dutton Price in the HBO drama series "Big Love".
Hoag later played Tandy Hampton in the television series "Nashville". After that, she played Stephanie Quinn in Syfy's fantasy series "The Magicians".
Hoag was born in Newburyport, Massachusetts.
